languages.text: "Я прибыл по зову моего наставника, благословенного {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната. На Райкаде Минорис мы должны были встретиться и обсудить мою миссию".

traits.locale_text: "Я прибыл по зову моего наставника, благословенного {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната. На Райкад Минорис мы должны были встретиться и обсудить мою миссию".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."
languages.original_text: "Я прибыл по зову моего наставника, благословенного {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната. На Райкаде Минорис мы должны были встретиться и обсудить мою миссию".

traits.locale_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我追随我的导师，蒙福者阿玛纳特{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}的召唤而来。我们本该在小莱卡德见面，讨论我的使命。”
languages.original_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."

traits.locale_text: “我追随我的导师，蒙福者阿玛纳特{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}的召唤而来。我们本该在小莱卡德见面，讨论我的使命。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Vine acatando la llamada de mi mentor, el bendito {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archimagos{/g} Amarnat. Se suponía que nos reuniríamos en Rykad Minoris para hablar de mi misión».
languages.original_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."

traits.locale_text: «Vine acatando la llamada de mi mentor, el bendito {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archimagos{/g} Amarnat. Se suponía que nos reuniríamos en Rykad Minoris para hablar de mi misión».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私は師である{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトの呼びかけに応じてやってきた。私たちはライカド・ミノリスで会い、私の使命について話し合うことになっていた」
languages.original_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."

traits.locale_text: 「私は師である{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトの呼びかけに応じてやってきた。私たちはライカド・ミノリスで会い、私の使命について話し合うことになっていた」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin dem Ruf meines Mentors gefolgt, des gesegneten {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat. Wir sollten uns auf Rykad Minoris treffen und meine Mission besprechen."
languages.original_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin dem Ruf meines Mentors gefolgt, des gesegneten {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat. Wir sollten uns auf Rykad Minoris treffen und meine Mission besprechen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai répondu à l'appel de mon mentor, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat le béni. Nous devions nous retrouver sur Rykad Minoris pour parler de ma mission. »
languages.original_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai répondu à l'appel de mon mentor, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat le béni. Nous devions nous retrouver sur Rykad Minoris pour parler de ma mission. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed Archmagos Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."

languages.text: "Yönderim, kutsanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ın çağrısına yanıt vererek geldim. Rykad Minoris'te buluşmamız ve misyonum üzerine konuşmamız gerekiyordu."
languages.original_text: "I came heeding the call of my mentor, the blessed {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat. We were supposed to meet on Rykad Minoris and discuss my mission."

traits.locale_text: "Yönderim, kutsanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ın çağrısına yanıt vererek geldim. Rykad Minoris'te buluşmamız ve misyonum üzerine konuşmamız gerekiyordu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
